analysis.selectType:
Select the transaction type you wish to query for {pair}:

⚡ Real-time Query: Clearly understand current market maker behavior for convenient trade planning  
📊 Intraday Trading: Analyze the day's market maker activity, suitable for short-term operations  
📈 Long-term Holding: Analyze long-term trends, ideal for value investing
analysis.inputPair: Please enter the pair you wish to query:
analysis.invalidInput: Invalid input, please enter the pair you wish to query:
analysis.description: Gather global mainstream exchanges and chain data, understand market maker behavior in one second
command.start.description: Gather global mainstream exchanges and chain data, understand market maker behavior in one second
analysis.tradeAnalysisDescription:
Select the currency you wish to inquire about:  
If no data is returned within 15 seconds, it may be that the currency is not listed or the market maker is not present. Please try another currency or try again later.
